A '''[[block]]''' is the basic unit of the world.

'''Block''' may also refer to:

== ''Minecraft'' ==
* [[Blocking]] - an action that prevents an attack from taking effect.
* [[Block states]] - extra pieces of data that further define a block, such as how it appears or behaves.
